embed.title: 🤝 Partner Collection: Gold Teeth Gang (GTG)
embed.description:
The **Gold Teeth Gang** just joined the Bandit family! 
All holders of the GTG NFTs with the **Closed Eye** trait get a **whitelist** 
— [check out the announcement on X](https://x.com/monad_bandit/status/1915744255378706709).

🔗 To claim yours, simply run **`/savewallet <your-address>`** 
Wait a couple hours and we’ll verify your NFT holdings.

 > Selling eligible NFTs will remove your whitelist(s).
